data.title: Rock N Roller Cart , On Sale Now!
data.meta_description: Handtrucks2go now features the updated rocknroller 8 in 1 multicart with no flat wheels. On sale now starting at $99 with Free Shipping! Use it as a DJ...
data.text:
Rock n Roller Carts: Do the Rolling Even When You’re Alone

It’s not bad to call for someone else’s help when you can’t do it your own. When moving, you can get help from your friends or from your neighbors. However, relying too much on others is not quite good. What if they’re not around? Who will help you move your heavy stuff? Maybe, the right question is: “what will help you move your heavy stuff?” Use hand carts, the Rock n Roller types!

What is Rock N Roller?

Rock n Roller hand carts are one of the quality brands. With them, you can move your stuff with ease! If you work in a pub or if you have a rock n rolling band, this hand cart definitely suits you, especially the Rock n Roller R10 cart!

Rock N Roller Hand Carts as Your Savior

Do you worry when your members flee to some place and you are all left alone to do the packing job? Worry not! The Rock n Roller hand cart is your savior on wheels. It is durable enough to carry 500 pounds of heavy load. What’s more, it is only weighing at around 31 pounds! You will not have difficulty in pushing this cart with your entire load on. It can carry your stuff like DJ racks, PA, keyboards and even drums.

Featuring the R Series

Rock n Roller hand carts especially the R series have larger storages or platforms. Wouldn’t that be nice? You can carry triple of your usual load! They have also designs tailored to meet your moving and lifting needs. They have flat free wheels for manageable pushing and of course, rolling.

With the 8-in-1 design of R10 hand trucks, you can easily change its shape. You can modify it as a 2-wheel hand truck or even a 4-wheel one! Changing its shape will only cost you two seconds. That’s indeed fast and incredibly awesome, right? Switching its modes is definitely a piece of cake! Even first timer hand truck users can assemble it.

No-Flat Wheels

The flat free wheels of the Rock n Roller hand carts are lightweight but strong. The wheels are also equipped with anti-wheel wobbles, the dampeners. Even if you are doing the moving alone, you can easily push the cart with heavy load on rough terrains like grass, dirt and concrete. The passenger loads on board will have a smooth ride.

Get Your Rock N Roller Cart Today

Now what? With Rock n Roller hand carts, you can get your job done even when alone. No more worries! These hand cart models will not drain all your energy and it will increase your work productivity. If you want to find the best choices, visit http://handtrucks2go.com/Rock-N-Roller.html right now.
